customblocker.name: Smelter, Mold-form
customblocker.description: This smelter definitely wasn't used on any kind of ore you know of.

customblocker.name: Smelter, Furnace
customblocker.description: This smelter definitely wasn't used on any kind of ore you know of.

customblocker.name: Skeleton
customblocker.description: The bones on this skeleton are thick and sturdy. Given the equipment about you, you guess that this is the smith who worked here.

customblocker.name: Rusty Trough
customblocker.description: The remains of an old water trough, used for quenching hot metal.

customblocker.name: Unsettling Painting
customblocker.description: Just looking at this painting of a sword gives you the chills. The gem in the middle of the sword - it appears to be looking back at you with a sort of menacing humour, the sort that a shark might give to a small fish just before gobbling it up.

customblocker.name: Unsettling Painting
customblocker.description: Just looking at this painting of a sword gives you the chills. The gem in the middle of the sword - it appears to be looking back at you with a sort of menacing humour, the sort that a shark might give to a small fish just before gobbling it up.

customblocker.name: Old Scratchings
customblocker.description: 'How many days has that undead fiend kept me slaving in this place? He has the magics to recreate the damned sword, yet not the strength of arm to beat out the imperfections in the blade - if it were anyone else, if the damnable thing could be used for any other purpose, I would have leapt at the chance, but...'

customblocker.name: Old Scratchings
customblocker.description: 'Though it is bitter much of the time, the demon in the painting is at least some form of company. Our fates are now clear - Dredmor intends to work me to death and beyond as his pet grandmaster smith, and the demon...well, it will suffer a fate worse than me, bound into the sword. I feel sorry for the creature - I will die and my spirit freed even if Dredmor raises my body, but the demon's imprisonment is eternal.'

customblocker.name: Old Scratchings
customblocker.description: 'Dredmor comes in every day to inspect my work; he grows impatient. I try to slow progress as much as possible without raising his suspicon; but it really is a shame to do this to such a wonderful material. Arcadion - for that is the demon's name - has proposed a plan to enact my certain death, without the chance that I can be raised to continue work on the damnable blade. This might be my chance.'

customblocker.name: Old Scratchings
customblocker.description: 'Arcadion's plan is clear: although he is imprisoned within the painting, he has kept hidden from Dredmor the fact that he can still exert a small amount of power - enough to char and ruin my corpse beyond all hope of reanimation. Small amounts of Mud Wen grow on the floor below; they should be enough to brew a potent poison. I must find some excuse to be allowed down there...Dredmor must not be allowed to possess the weapon he seeks to forge.'

customblocker.name: Force Field
customblocker.description: A magical barrier bars your path.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Solve the puzzle, adventurer, and access the fount of knowledge. Steel thy mind and be prepared.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: An island is populated by Knights and Knaves. Knights always tell the truth, whereas Knaves always lie. One day, you visit the island and meet two of the islanders, Jack and Jill. Each of them is either a Knight or a Knave, although you don't know which. You ask, and Jack says: 'either Jill's a Knight OR I'm a Knave.'

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: What canst thou conclude? Is Jack a a) Knave, b) Knight, or c) is it impossible to tell? The levers correspond to the answers from left to right; pull the one thou thinks is the answer. But be forewarned: thou hast only one chance to give thy answer.

customblocker.name: Hint
customblocker.description: If thou art having difficulties, adventurer, consider each possibility. Can either one lead you to a contradiction?

action.text: You are utterly...wrong!
You are utterly...wrong!
You are utterly...right!

pedestal.name: Inscription
pedestal.text: You have proven your worth; take this mirror of our power. Signed, Athos, Porthos, Aramis and D'Artagn...we mean, Cobalion, Terrakion, Virizion and Keldeo.

customblocker.name: Bed
customblocker.description: You can save your adventure by going to bed. Would you like to save your adventure now?

customblocker.name: Bed
customblocker.description: Yay! We get beds!

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Wake up already!

customblocker.name: Window
customblocker.description: The cheery little window offers an excellent view of a seaside bluff in the distance.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Solve ye puzzle, and earn a reward. Fit the runes where they belong and pull the lever; the other signs hold the clues you'll need.

customblocker.description: I am constantly hungry. I devour all that they will feed me, but the pain never ceases.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: They made me touch all sorts of stones today. I do not understand why...

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: What is this thing they are doing to us? This 'evolution'?

pedestal.text: Day four: The initial experiments go well. Dredmor has, through various intermediaries, purchased a number of these 'evolution stones'. Major tests are poised to commence soon.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: What is a pokemon, and why do they want us to be like them?

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: I heard them call me a failure, but I can feel it. I'm just not changing on the outside...

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: BETTER SAFE THAN SORRY BETTER SAFE THAN SORRY BETTER SAFE THAN SORRY BETTER SAFE THAN SORRY BETTER SAFE THAN SORRY

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: This rack appears to have been used as a table at some point.

customblocker.name: Note from Martha
customblocker.description: Have you seen Mittens, Andrea? I can't help but keep wringing my flippers in worry; it's not like that kitten to vanish without a trace.

pedestal.name: Research Log
pedestal.text: Day seven: A man from Team (redacted), our supplier, arrived today to help us install the new equipment. He seems a nice enough chap and quite cute too; I wonder if I'll be seeing him again.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: We've formulated a bid for freedom, but we need a willing sacrifice...

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: I'll feed your souls to Hakkar himself!

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: Serpents, serpents everywhere-in my food, hanging from the ceiling, winding through the bars, serp

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: I can hear them clawing at the door. I know that they want; I have sinned enough against them, and will go out to make what small repayment I can in blood.

customblocker.description: This rack seems untouched.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: Use only in case of emergency.

customblocker.name: Dosing Schedule
customblocker.description: 'Control group: nothing. Group A: rare candies only. Group B: powdered water stones and rare candies to 50%, made up with placebo...'the rest is illegible.

pedestal.name: Research Log
pedestal.text: Day nine: Oh my gosh! I'm so glad I got that guy's number; I called him up and it was really embarassing for me to ask him to take me out, but he said yes! Oh my gosh!

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: Watching...waiting...we don't tire, we don't sleep...

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: Madness is the only solace in this benighted place.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: Man, I could really do with a Jill Sandwich right about now.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: To everyone in the project: please be reminded that control of all specimens involved is of the highest importance. Wear your protective equipment before handling them.

pedestal.name: Research Log
pedestal.text: Day fifteen: We've had a minor mishap today: one of the specimens struggled loose and ran around for a bit until we could properly contain it. No lasting damage done, though, only our pride.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: IIIII IIIII IIIII IIIII IIIII II.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: To anyone who reads this: let it be known that I regret participating in this crossover attempt.

customblocker.name: Biohazard Warning
customblocker.description: Good working practices are a requirement of continued employment in Dredmor Labs. Dispose of all biological waste in the provided evisceration chutes.

pedestal.name: Research Log
pedestal.text: Day twenty-two: Today, Andrea accused me of not feeding the specimens, making them too aggressive to safely handle, even remotely. I did, though, and two helpings of ground meat at that. What gives?

customblocker.description: Seems like someone drank a lot of coffee here.

customblocker.description: Hehehe. Fools...

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: I cannot see myself, but I know I've changed. There are things rippling under my skin now...

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: This specimen has kept a faithful count of its days in imprisonment.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: Why are you doing this to me? I thought we were friends!

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: And now I lay myself to rest-I can but hope for the best-if I should die before I wake-my soul is Lord Dredmor's to take.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: Seems like they didn't make it here in time.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Wear your respirator at all times. Noncompliance will be punished by a stint in the naughty corner.

pedestal.name: Research Log
pedestal.text: Day twenty-five: The specimens continue to grow more aggressive; Lord Dredmor will be pleased. Nick was taken sick today; I hope I can get today's work done in time for my dinner date.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: I feel so sick, so weak, but incredibly strong in a way I cannot describe...

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: They don't know yet, but sometimes...I think...I've started to glow...

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: To whomever follows me after my body gives: play along with them. Complacency creeps into their actions by the day.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: Never more shall I...

customblocker.description: WE HAVE SOWN THE SEEDS AND NOW REAP THE HARVEST.

pedestal.name: Research Log
pedestal.text: Day twenty-seven: The dinner date was so amazing! He was so cute and so gentlemanly and with that team surcoat of his...ooh, but I'm getting ahead of myself. We're really shorthanded with Nick not around.

customblocker.name: Old Desk

pedestal.name: Research Log
pedestal.text: Day thirty-three: This is going to be my last entry; I hear the quarantine team coming for me now. To be honest, I feel so sick I'm glad to see them. To whoever is reading this - all I can say is, save yourself.

customblocker.name: Makeshift Whiteboard
customblocker.description: Adventurer Parmigiana. Serves 4, 10 minute preparation, 55 minute cooking time. Two tablespoons olive oil, one small onion, finely chopped, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 200g fairywodger, quartered, 1 large Carrotty, diced, 500g tomatoes, chopped, 15g fresh basil, roughly torn, 4 skinless adventurer breast fillets, 2 tablespoons grated cheese.

customblocker.name: Makeshift Whiteboard
customblocker.description: Preheat the over to 190 degrees celsius. Heat the oil in a deep frying pan, add the onion and garlic and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes over medium heat. Add fairywodger and cook until lightly browned, stirring frequently. Stir in Carrotty, cook for 2 minutes, then add tomatoes and stir over medium-high heat for 2 minutes. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes until thick, then add basil and season.

customblocker.name: Makeshift Whiteboard
customblocker.description: Arrange the adventurer breasts in a single layer in a deep, ovenproof baking or casserole dish and spoon the sauce over the top. Cover and bake for 25 minutes or until meat is thoroughly cooked. Towards the end of the cooking time, preheat the grill. Uncover the meat and sprinkle the grated cheese over the top of the dish. Put the dish under the grill until the cheese is melted and bubbling. Serve.

customblocker.name: Makeshift Whiteboard
customblocker.description: 'In order to make a good wand, you'll first need some proper wood. Apply some enchanting oil to the palm of your hand and steadily work the shaft until it becomes stiff and turgid; you don't want your wand to fail you in a dangerous and climactic situation. Once that's done, continue with broad, steady strokes while incanting the words of power...'

customblocker.name: Makeshift Whiteboard
customblocker.description: '...and you're done charging your wand. Don't forget to clean up the resultant ectoplasmic mess, especially if any's gotten onto you. That's basic hygiene. Always dispose of the paper towel you use in a proper thaumahazardous waste container, or at least, where no one can find it.'

customblocker.name: Grading Report
customblocker.description: Biggus: A+. Long, thick, and every one throbbing and pulsing with power - this young man shows promise as a crafter of mighty wands.

customblocker.name: Grading Report
customblocker.description: Vael: A-. Very single-minded. Please remember specialisation is for insects and assembly-line workers.

customblocker.name: Grading Report
customblocker.description: Zer'gulugog: D. Technically she did complete the assignment, but hacking off one of your own limbs for use in a school project is not appropriate behaviour.

customblocker.name: Grading Report
customblocker.description: Larry Potter: C+. Satisfactory, although there are some...disturbing implications. Recommend counselling.

customblocker.name: Grading Report
customblocker.description: Limpus: F. Will never satisfy anyone with this sort of effort, let alone me.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: Advertisments for wandcrafting gels, lubricants and suspicious enhancers fill these shelves.

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: 'Increase your magical potency by as much as three times with our brand new pill! Get your power up faster! Last Longer! Stun your associates with just how much raw power you can discharge in one go!'

customblocker.name: Shelves
customblocker.description: 'Magic turning dull for you? That dark, handsome - and above all, forbidden - grimoire in the library's restricted section look tempting as opposed to your faithful spellbook? Mistress Gytha will guide you, young sorceress, through seven easy steps to rekindle your love of the arcane!'

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: By order of Commando High Command, all books in the library are strictly for reference only. No borrowing is allowed.

customblocker.name: Commando Mural
customblocker.description: The inscription under the mural reads 'Who dares, digs.' The Diggle Commando Library was opened in honour of the famed commando Digbo, and many a commando-in-training spends their time here learning to effectively neutralise eyebrowed adventurers.

customblocker.name: Classic Painting
customblocker.description: Sir Flannegan's masterpiece, 'Surprised Unicorn', was painted during his early period as an artist and is generally considered one of the more reliable likenesses of these elusive creatures. Many theories have been put forward, but no one is quite sure why the unicorn in the picture is suprised.

customblocker.name: Shrine to Obsidia
customblocker.description: This shrine is dedicated to Obsidia, daughter of the dragon god of earth and one of the draconic pantheon's lesser deities. Note her expression, the pinprick of her pupils, her teeth that even the mural's bright colours can't get to look friendly - she must be a nice young lady.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: These candles are covered in runes depicting the draconic deities.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'My daughter hasn't passed a single exam of late, Goddess. I worry for her future...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: These prayer candles have been lit for so long that the wax has melted through and through. At least it's a less bloody way of sending prayers than what the Church of Demonology does.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: The prayers on these candles are not addressed to Obsidia herself, but to her father. You remember hearing it's rather standard practice amongst dragons to do that, since His name is not to be spoken.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'And She said to the ailing: come, warm yourslves in my fire and let your ailments fall away like old scales...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Goddess, I make this offering as thanks for even having the chance to apply for a position at...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: '...For those who would demean her will face the full force of Her birthright - the fury of the earth itself.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: These candles have draconic symbols of fertility and abundance etched into their wax.

action.text: You hear what sounds like anguished sobbing in the distance, and the shrine erupts in flames!

customblocker.name: Shrine to Obsidia
customblocker.description: This shrine is dedicated to Obsidia, daughter of the dragon god of earth and one of the draconic pantheon's lesser deities. Note her expression, the pinprick of her pupils, her teeth that even the mural's bright colours can't get to look friendly - she must be a nice young lady.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: These candles have a fragrant herbal scent to them.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: Small, sweet berries have been placed alongside these candles.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Bless us, Mother, that our harvest may be plentiful and that we shall not want...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: These prayers are from a certain Dray'gon, requesting for more friends in the dungeon to play with.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Mother, I really hate having to eat ground meat while everyone else eats grown-up food. Mommy says I can join in when I'm older, but when is that?'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Goddess, we give thanks for our light and our lives, for the warmth of your body...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: These particular candles don't seem to be made out of wax.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: '...I shall try again today, Goddess. If I fail, my soul is yours...

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: The prayers on these candles have been etched in old draconic and are foreign to you.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Obsidia, mother of us all, we beg a boon of you. Help our friends the diggles; they have been struggling of late and it pains us to see them...

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'My mate is so gravid she can scarcely rise from the nest, let alone fly. Goddess, I ask for your favour in hunting...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: '...We shall not fear, we shall not want...

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Her father is the lord of the land and the earth is his body and domain, but it is she who brings forth life from it...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Goddess, I give thanks, not for anything in particular but for the miracle of still being alive.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: '...From the ashes rise new growth, and that is the way of the land.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Goddess, we plead with you to save us from the eyebrowed horrors.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: The prayers on these candles have been etched in old draconic and are foreign to you.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Goddess, please watch over my cousin, Sasenthys. We hear of a plague of adventurers in that part of the world and fear for her.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'The safe hatching of our wyrmlings brings us hope for the future. Convey our thanks to your father, goddess.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: '...As the mother watches over her brood and feeds them, so does She guide our paths and bring forth Her father's providence.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'I beg a miracle, Goddess. My brother is deathly ill...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Mother Goddess Obsidia, today my brood and I ventured out of the dungeon for a spring picnic, and the hand of your power was to be seen everywhere...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: These candles look to be made of poorer quality wax than the others. Now if only Krong could inspire such devoutness...

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Goddess, my mother was slain by an eyebrowed horror. Grant me the strength of will and body, the strength of the earth to avenge my mother and your fallen child...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Goddess, that drake over by the next lava stream - he's a really fine specimen, and I'm sure he's been making eyes at me and I just feel all hot inside when I look at him...'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: The prayers on these candles mostly depict dragons intertwined about one another and doing unmentionable things.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: The runes on these candles are in old draconic and make no sense to you.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'Thank you for your miracle, goddess. My brother has recovered and is whole again.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: '...and I hope to be able to make my pilgrimage to the mountain next year, Goddess.'

customblocker.name: Offerings Altar
customblocker.description: The dragons faithfully place their offerings here.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: '...And being newly mated to Talnoth - I know everyone says it fades with time, but I can't help but feel so happy.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: The prayer candles here have been dripped with lava to give them a pleasant - well, to dragons - scent to accompany the prayers.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: '...Goddess, please help me, I don't know what to do...maybe I'll sell a little of my blood at the blood bank, they pay nicely for certain kinds and even give you a cup of sweet tea and a sugared biscuit. So what if the recipients get mixed up every now and then?'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: '...I feel so heavy, so hot, so swollen; I'm hungry all the time and can hardly move from the nest, and yet it feels...incredible. Thank you, goddess.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'I'm thinking about investing my hoard in some property, Goddess, maybe a couple of townhouses through human intermediaries. I shan't ask you for luck, since someone has to lose in this game, but I just want to give my thanks.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: The runes on these candles are in old draconic and make no sense to you.

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: 'You have triumphed through me, Goddess. Good overcomes evil once again, the land is liberated, the demon is slain. The eyebrowed horror is dead.'

customblocker.name: Prayer Candles
customblocker.description: The flames here are far hotter than what should be possible for simple candles.

customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines again. Dredmor's put them to good use tallying up the numbers.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: This branch of the First Bank of Dredmor is monitored from a remote location. Don't get any ideas.

action.text: Guess you tripped a silent alarm there, eh?

pedestal.name: Deranged Doodles
pedestal.text: Oh, how should I dress myself to-day? I feel so pretty, and witty, and gay!

customblocker.name: Staff Rack
customblocker.description: A good wizard's staff always has a knob on the end.

customblocker.name: Dragon Nest
customblocker.description: A swampy dragon's nest.

customblocker.name: Dragon Nest
customblocker.description: A swampy dragon's nest.

customblocker.name: Dragon Nest
customblocker.description: A swampy dragon's nest.

customblocker.name: Dragon Nest
customblocker.description: A swampy dragon's nest.

customblocker.name: Soggy Hole
customblocker.description: This hole leads back to the hidden passage.

pedestal.name: Soggy Scroll
pedestal.text: Congratulations on finding the secret treasure trove! Don't let it get to your head.

customblocker.name: Deathly Ferrywoman
customblocker.description: The nametag on this deathly apparition's robe reads 'Sharon'. It notices you, guesses your intent, then points a bony finger across the river's course before speaking in a sepulchral and chilling, yet distinctly feminine voice. 'For you...no charge.'

customblocker.name: Deathly Ferrywoman
customblocker.description: The nametag on this deathly apparition's robe reads 'Sharon'. It notices you, guesses your intent, then points a bony finger across the river's course before speaking in a sepulchral and chilling, yet distinctly feminine voice. 'For you...no charge.'

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: To cross the the River Sticks, please step on the designated spot.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: To cross the the River Sticks, please step on the designated spot.

customblocker.name: Collections Coffer
customblocker.description: It's full of all sorts of ancient and mysterious coins. The dead sure come in all sorts.

customblocker.name: Collections Coffer
customblocker.description: It's full of all sorts of ancient and mysterious coins. The dead sure come in all sorts.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Blood bank storage - for employees only.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Welcome to Alucard's Blood Bank! Please register at the counter, take a seat at the bleeding station and place your wrist over the bowl; our helpful attendants will be there to serve you shortly. Remember to collect a token of our thanks at the counter before you leave!

customblocker.name: Blood Bowl
customblocker.description: Smells like pennies. Tastes like pennies, too.

customblocker.name: Blood Bowl
customblocker.description: Smells like pennies. Tastes like pennies, too.

customblocker.name: Blood Bowl
customblocker.description: Smells like pennies. Tastes like pennies, too.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: If you need help with recommendations for suitable employment, please check in with the front counter.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: Hero Management Technician required on fifth level. Must be physically fit; no prior experience necessary. Contact Orgosh.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: The Thrusties Thrust Trust seeks one Cleanliness Operative; young females preferred, but we'll hire anyone interested enough. Duties will involve clearing blockages and spills and maintaining general hygiene in the Thrusty baths. High starting salary offered, as well as the opportunity to make friends and earn additional benefits.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: Nimmy Geebeewhiz seeks additional hands to help bring in the harvest in his orchard. Apply at level 14.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: New geology teacher required after the previous one was dismissed owing to anger issues. Applicants should have the appropriate teaching qualifications and at least five years' experience working with young monsters. Apply to the Headmaster, Dredmor Academy, floor 11.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: Babysitter for wyrmling required so we can go out of the dungeon on a date. The young one is perpetually hungry and needs constant care; paying rate is 50 zorkmids per hour. Dragons only.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: The Digglington Gentlemen's Secret Wine Club requires the services of one bouncer to eliminate rude riff-raff from our distinguished club. Prospective applicants should be physically intimidating and look good in a tuxedo.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: We, the Carrottys of level 6, need one kind soul to pour water over us on a regular basis, for without water, we would die. We need water poured on us because we have no hands to hold glasses of water.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: The Mustache League would like to source for the services of one caterer to provide meals on Fridays after our all-day training. Interested parties should be skilled in fusion cuisine such as lutefisk sushi, teppenyucky and steamed dang-itgo.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: Help wanted! B-Mart is hiring store assistants to help with stocking, attractive arrangement of merchandise, and book-keeping. Simply walk into one of our stores today, and ask for the manager! B-Mart! We're a family!

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: Dungeons of Dredmor is seeking one vending machine stocker. The job scope involves travelling the length of the dungeon, stocking vending machines, and attending to malfunctions as necessary. High salary, hero encounter insurance and travel fare will be provided by authority of Lord Dredmor.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: Looking for a good time in the company of some elegant and exquisite women? Do just that, and get paid in the process! The Red Lichess Society is appealing to all charmers to wow us with what you have! Note that we reserve the right to your soul if you fail to perform adequately.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: The Robo Society is looking for interested parties to compete against our old rivals, the Golems, in the monthly chess tournament. Prize money will be split evenly amongst all members of the team.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: I need a potion of purity, but the local B-Mart's all out. Can someone whip one up for me? Rich reward offered! - a sickly diggle.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: The Villainous Vipers of Vile Villainry is seeking entry-level applicants for immediate openings available in general annoyance, underwear theft, and food spoiling. Gnomish applicants only; should have a Master's Degree in evil. Eating unbalanced vegan meals, spending more than you earn and possession of a hipster gnomish cap are all pluses.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: Beleaguered modder requires help in coming up with descriptions for his customblockers. Haha, not really.

customblocker.name: Job Postings
customblocker.description: The Clockwork Knights Foreign Legion is now recruiting! All nationalities and species accepted; sell your body and soul to forget who you are amidst arid expanses of dust and sand! Glory to the Empire!

customblocker.name: Composting Bucket
customblocker.description: The stuff in this old bucket smells absolutely awful. It's little wonder the bin's absolutely corroded.

customblocker.name: Evisceration Chute Exit
customblocker.description: All sorts of foul smells leak from the exit of this evisceration chute.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Still
customblocker.description: Well, looks like sewer brew's quite literally sewer brew.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Still
customblocker.description: Well, looks like sewer brew's quite literally sewer brew.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Still
customblocker.description: Well, looks like sewer brew's quite literally sewer brew.

customblocker.name: Product Bin
customblocker.description: You once met a man who tried to ferment fish skins. This bin smells even worse than him.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: 'Being dead is no excuse for not wearing your hazmat suit while working with biological waste. More lives than your own depend on your cleanliness.'

customblocker.name: Dredmor Recycling Theme Song
customblocker.description: 'Watch that litter, recycle that trash - or Dredmor'll blast you into ash - It's his dungeon, don't you see - so keep it clean for you and me.'

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: This site has worked '113' days without an accident.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Remember what Lord Dredmor says about occupational hazards - 'work smarter, not harder.'

customblocker.name: Evisceration Chute Exit
customblocker.description: This evisceration chute's littered with shredded plastic.

customblocker.name: Smelter, Mold-form
customblocker.description: Traces of molten plastic cling to the edges of this smelter.

customblocker.name: Smelter, Furnace
customblocker.description: Traces of molten plastic cling to the edges of this smelter.

customblocker.name: Product Bin
customblocker.description: An old bin, weighted down with years of holding recycled plastic.

customblocker.name: Product Pedestal
customblocker.description: For allowing the recycled products to cool.

customblocker.name: Product Pedestal
customblocker.description: For allowing the recycled products to cool.

customblocker.name: Dredmor Assembly Line Workbench
customblocker.description: This standard-issue workbench has seen years and years of repeated use.

customblocker.name: Dredmor Assembly Line Workbench
customblocker.description: This standard-issue workbench has seen years and years of repeated use.

customblocker.name: Dredmor Assembly Line Workbench
customblocker.description: This standard-issue workbench has seen years and years of repeated use.

customblocker.name: Tinkerer's Furnace
customblocker.description: This furnace stinks of burnt plastic.

customblocker.name: Tinkerer's Furnace
customblocker.description: This furnace stinks of burnt plastic.

customblocker.name: Open Grave
customblocker.description: If you're going to go that far, you might as well take that that nice bouquet by the graveside. It'd make a nice gift for grandma.

customblocker.name: Open Grave
customblocker.description: The grave is empty and smells clean, instead of the zomby-esque stech you were expecting. Guess someone was using this as a stash.

customblocker.name: Open Grave
customblocker.description: Oh, so THAT's where Timmy fell into that last time.

customblocker.name: Open Grave
customblocker.description: They say you can't take it with you. This one did.

customblocker.name: Open Grave
customblocker.description: The grave is empty and smells clean, instead of the zomby-esque stech you were expecting. Guess someone was using this as a stash.

customblocker.name: Fungal Lamp
customblocker.description: This fungal lamp forms the middle of the fairy ring and is plenty bright for the gnomes to hold evil dances by.

customblocker.name: Gnomish Hacking Device
customblocker.description: This screen depicts a dastardly plot to hack into automated sock factories and create immense numbers of odd socks.

customblocker.name: Gnomish Hacking Device
customblocker.description: Ugh! So that's what happened to your cart keys! Curse those nefarious gnomes! Curse them!

customblocker.name: Gnomish Computer
customblocker.description: Cobbled together from leaves, twigs, an aethereal power cylinder and infused with the powdered remains of a horse armour programmer, the average gnomish computer is only capable of evil.

customblocker.name: Gnomish Computer
customblocker.description: Cobbled together from leaves, twigs, an aethereal power cylinder and infused with the powdered remains of a horse armour programmer, the average gnomish computer is only capable of evil.

customblocker.name: Gnomish Computer
customblocker.description: The gnomes need these computers to simply quantify the sheer amount of evil they do in a day.

customblocker.name: Gnomish Computer
customblocker.description: This computer reeks with the stench of pure gnomish evil.

customblocker.name: Evil Records
customblocker.description: According to the gnomish forecast, evil is set to rise about 75 percent in the next year, mostly fuelled by stolen office supplies, Dredmor, and bad-tasting vegan meals.

customblocker.name: Evil Autobiographies
customblocker.description: A book catches your eye - 'From Nobody to Nefarious', an autobiography of Eppus Evilus, the most evil gnome ever.

customblocker.name: Evil Shelves
customblocker.description: These shelves are stained with delicious fruit, the most evil substance known in the universe.

customblocker.name: Evil Awards
customblocker.description: These shelves are chock-full of awards handed out by Lord Dredmor for general all-round villianry and annoyance.

customblocker.name: Evil Sign
customblocker.description: Evil computing room

customblocker.name: Evil Sign
customblocker.description: CEO's evil office

customblocker.name: Evil Sign
customblocker.description: Storeroom of Evil

customblocker.name: Evil Notice
customblocker.description: 'Make sure to deliver all Evil on time to the appropriate dungeon floors. Failure to abide by the stipulated schedule will be punished by a 30 percent ration cut and a timeout in the evisceration corner.'

customblocker.name: Evil Notice Board
customblocker.description: It's where the gnomes make suggestions to help each other become more evil.

customblocker.name: Evil Notice Board
customblocker.description: 'Remember our code - 1. Be evil. 2. Be more evil. 3. ????? 4. Evil profit!'

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Warning! Minefield ahead. Pull lever to engage minesweeping force.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Warning! Minefield ahead. Pull lever to engage minesweeping force.

action.text: Minesweeping force deployed!
Minesweeping force deployed!

customblocker.name: Summoning Circle
customblocker.description: Ia! Ia! Applethulu fthagn!

customblocker.name: Old Cauldron
customblocker.description: It smells of delicious vegetable soup. Mm, it's making you hungry.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Please limit your use of the treadmills to thirty minutes at one go.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Please set down your weights gently.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Please observe pool safety.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Register at the front counter before using the facilities.

customblocker.name: Training Weight
customblocker.description: The muscle diggles are literally pumping iron here.

customblocker.name: Training Weight
customblocker.description: The muscle diggles are literally pumping iron here.

customblocker.name: Training Weight
customblocker.description: The muscle diggles are literally pumping iron here.

customblocker.name: Provocative Poster
customblocker.description: It's an advert for 'JUGGS' minotaur milk, this time with a pin-up of a young minotaur lady in a tight-fitting milkman costume. 'I am the milkman, my milk is delicious,' the undertext reads.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: You will be baked, and then there will be cake.

action.text: You have been baked, and now there is cake.

customblocker.name: Rough Scratchings
customblocker.description: The cake, she is not real! Do not believe them!

action.text: I TOLD you the cake was a lie.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Cake or Pie?

action.text: So, you've made your choice. Don't regret it.
So, you've made your choice. Don't regret it.

customblocker.name: Computer
customblocker.description: It's where the teachers enter grades into the system.

customblocker.name: Computer
customblocker.description: It's where the teachers enter grades into the system.

customblocker.name: Teacher's Desk
customblocker.description: Seems like this teacher's fallen behind on grading reports.

customblocker.name: Teacher's Desk
customblocker.description: Judging from the students' grades, there's a bright future for this dungeon. Or is it dark?

customblocker.name: Teacher's Desk
customblocker.description: It's a secret passage the teachers use to nip out of the dungeon for a drink every now and then. A mysterious force bars you from using it, though - T-space is only usable by teachers, mostly to get between classes in an instant.

customblocker.name: Dredmor Academy Teaching Staff
customblocker.description: Distilling - Mr. C'thun. Counselor - Mr. Nasaghast. Tinkering - Gyrandar the Solid. Cooking - Ms. Blossom. Alchemy - Ms. Zeetha. Mycology and Botany - Mr. Green. Practical Geology - Sir Archibald Diggleton. Smithing - The Hunk. Wands - Professor Spunky.

customblocker.name: Mouldy Bones
customblocker.description: The damp conditions have caused mushrooms to sprout on these bones.

customblocker.name: Mouldy Bones
customblocker.description: The damp conditions have caused mushrooms to sprout on these bones.

customblocker.name: Pile of Skulls
customblocker.description: Ugh, there're fungal threads sprouting from the eye sockets.

customblocker.name: Mouldy Bones
customblocker.description: The damp conditions have caused mushrooms to sprout on these bones.

customblocker.description: The damp conditions have caused mushrooms to sprout on these bones.

customblocker.name: Pile of Skulls

customblocker.name: Restless Grave
customblocker.description: You can hear shifting and scratching coming from within the grave.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Anvil loading docks.

customblocker.name: Uberlever
customblocker.description: It's the lock control mechanism. Unfortunately, it seems that only the dock workers are strong enough to shift it.

customblocker.name: Delivery Schedule
customblocker.description: Monday - three Krong anvils to be distributed on this floor. Wednesday - seven normal anvils to the smithies on floors four and seven. Friday - one for Lord Dredmor's personal use. Next arrival is on Sunday.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: For all its comedic effect, hanging anvils precariously from the ceiling is against DSHA regulations and is grounds for immediate termination.

customblocker.name: Workbench
customblocker.description: The drawers are full of anvil repair tools.

customblocker.name: Stocktaking Records
customblocker.description: The dock workers are surprisingly good at numbers. According to the records, Dredmor's been ordering a lot of anvils lately. You can't help but wonder why.

loot.subtype: My Little Anvil Junior Smithing Kit
My Little Anvil Junior Smithing Kit

customblocker.name: Fishy Sconce
customblocker.description: The fishy little flame beats with the steady rhythm of the waves.

customblocker.name: Fishy Sconce
customblocker.description: The fishy little flame beats with the steady rhythm of the waves.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The flames of these candles writhe tentacularly in the damp air.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The flames of these candles struggle against the dampness.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The flames of these candles struggle against the dampness.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The flames of these candles struggle against the dampness.

customblocker.name: Sink
customblocker.description: There's definitely something fishy about this sink.

customblocker.name: Sink
customblocker.description: There's definitely something fishy about this sink.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Cleanse thyself before entering the inner sanctum.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Today in the mess hall - fusion cuisine in honour of the Lutefisk god. Praise be to cod!

action.text: Aah! Too much oil! The BBQ explodes in a mess of oil and fire!
Aah! Too much oil! The BBQ explodes in a mess of oil and fire!

customblocker.name: Scrawl
customblocker.description: Down with the old cows!

customblocker.name: Scrawl
customblocker.description: Vengeance is ours! Minotaur milk for minotaurs only!

customblocker.name: Sickening Schedule
customblocker.description: It's a schedule, arranged with the mysterious minotaur matriarchs for stud services to be sent to the dungeon. Seems like minotaur men aren't faring any better than the women are.

customblocker.name: Provocative Poster
customblocker.description: It's an advertisment for 'JUGGS' minotaur milk. Just HOW do minotaur women not suffer back pains with lady lumps that huge? Sure, they've got much stronger back muscles than humans, but even so...

customblocker.name: Milking Machine
customblocker.description: A sinister-looking milking machine, complete with a seat for a humanoid creature, tubes, and two large cup-shaped implements.

customblocker.name: Milking Machine
customblocker.description: A sinister-looking milking machine, complete with a seat for a humanoid creature, tubes, and two large cup-shaped implements.

customblocker.name: Milking Machine
customblocker.description: A sinister-looking milking machine, complete with a seat for a humanoid creature, tubes, and two large cup-shaped implements.

customblocker.name: Maddened Scrawl
customblocker.description: 'For years now, I, the King and Queen of Milk, have laboured to find the perfect source of milk! I've tried everything - barrel milk! Phoenix milk! Batty milk! Minotaur milk, freshly squeezed in the dead of night from young, luscious minotaur maidens! I've even tried Dredmor milk! But none, none had that wonderful, amazing taste sensation I was seeking - until I stumbled upon ice-cold Carrotty milk! Such flavour! Such richness! Oh, I could weep!'

customblocker.name: Provocative Poster
customblocker.description: It's an advertisment for 'JUGGS' minotaur milk, with a young minotaur woman and her massive mammaries in a provocative pose. So provocative, in fact, that we can't show you it. Here, have a blank poster and use your imagination instead.

customblocker.name: Pasteurisation Device

customblocker.description: Shrooms - 1000 zorkmids per weight. Powders (except aluminum) - 2200 zorkmids a cut. Powdered aluminum - 3700 zorkmids a cut. Ugh, if this is what the golems have been doing, no wonder they're unhealthy.

customblocker.description: Round up and see the amazing Diggle Brothers! Marco, Polo, Iolo, Mofo, Frodo, Bobo, Nono and Robo are performing here and now in their amazing contorting diggle act!

customblocker.description: A faithful likeness of the draconic mother goddess Obsidia.

customblocker.name: Commando Mural
customblocker.description: This is a replica mural of Digbo, the famous diggle commando. It's just an artist's impression, since no one's really seen the guy.

customblocker.description: One of the few rare likenesses of the Thrusty hero Double-Tap, donated to the gallery by the Thrusties.

customblocker.description: Dredmor on the art gallery's opening day.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: The Menangerie is for guests only. Failure to comply will result in offensive action.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Do not touch the exhibits.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Gallery rules will be strictly enforced.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: If your request cannot be processed, contact the curator immediately.

action.text: The Menangerie is for guests only. You are not a guest.

customblocker.name: Breadfruit Tree
customblocker.description: Just your common, everyday breadfruit tree, bearing the thick, starchy fruit that gives it its name.

customblocker.name: Steak Plant
customblocker.description: Carefully bred and chosen by the Order of Militant Vegans, the steak plant is an attempt to produce cruelty-free meat - but isn't that cruel to the plant?

customblocker.name: Eggplant
customblocker.description: Well, now! You didn't know they took it that literally!

customblocker.name: Cheese Plant
customblocker.description: The cheese plant is one of the exceptions to the general rule of not drinking milky plant sap - the stuff oozes from its stem and congeals into something approaching cheese. It's a natural example of symbiosis, in this case with frying-pan wielding mice.

customblocker.name: Strange Crystals
customblocker.description: This obviously magical crystal formation adds to the oddity of the place.

customblocker.name: Strange Crystals
customblocker.description: This obviously magical crystal formation adds to the oddity of the place.

customblocker.name: Strange Crystals
customblocker.description: This obviously magical crystal formation adds to the oddity of the place.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Nimmy Geebeewhiz's fruit stand. Fresh fruit for sale, inquire here - no service for eyebrowed horrors.

customblocker.name: Makeshift Stall
customblocker.description: To you it's just high enough to be a cupboard or set of shelves, perhaps, but to a gnome it's a whole fruit stand.

customblocker.name: Monitor
customblocker.description: Internalized assembly line downstream output system v.1.2.2 on-line. Prepared to dispense product.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: It's the manual override for the Robo assembly system. Sure, the whole system is automated, but Dredmor always likes having the option of having his minions slave away for no good reason.

action.text: Zaaaap...thunk. Hatches open up in the wall and a bunch of automatons pop out.

customblocker.name: Monitor
customblocker.description: Internalized assembly line downstream output system v.1.2.2 on-line. Prepared to dispense product.

action.text: Zaaaap...thunk. Hatches open up in the wall and a bunch of automatons pop out.

customblocker.name: Davey Jones' Locker
customblocker.description: If you're going to be doing this, you might as well look the part.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: Quickly, laddie (or lassie)! Pull this here lever to board ye ship, and be ready to repel boarders! Make sure ye olde firing path's clear a'fore boarding!

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: You made it on board! Now, listen up to this old sea-dog. These here levers on the left control the cannons, pull them to fire the respective cannon. The one on the upper right will summon ye scurvy landlubbers to start swarming ye ship! Ye one in the middle gives them a taste of the ol' broadside, but with weaker shot, and the lower right one's if ye wanna git off the ship. Ya got all that, m' salty mate?

action.text: Avast! Prepare to repel boarders!

customblocker.name: Monitor
customblocker.description: Voltaic Hallway Disruptor v0.2.3. Status: On-line and ready for repeated discharge.

customblocker.name: Monitor
customblocker.description: Voltaic Hallway Disruptor v0.2.3. Status: On-line and ready for repeated discharge.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: This diggle is unable to hurt you. Pulling this lever will kill it horribly and painfully. Its life is completely in your hands - you choose whether it lives or dies. What will you do?

action.name: Sign
action.description: So, you're that kind of fellow. Good luck...you'll need it.

action.name: Sign
action.description: So, you're that kind of fellow. Good luck, you'll need it!

customblocker.name: Child's Remains
customblocker.description: These remains look awfully small. Too small to have come from an adult. There's an eyepatch in the midst of the lot.

customblocker.name: Bloodied Scrawl
customblocker.description: Dear Diary: Today I died. I was killed in some swampy cave by - this - thing. I leave all that I own to my cat Guppy (cool stuff!). Goodbye, cruel world - love, Cain.

customblocker.name: Child's Remains

customblocker.name: Bloodied Scrawl
customblocker.description: Dear Diary: Today I died. I was killed in some moonbase by - this - thing. I leave all that I own to my cat Guppy (cool stuff!). Goodbye, cruel world - love, Isaac.

customblocker.name: Notice
customblocker.description: In case you're surrounded, pull the lever.

customblocker.name: Evisceration Chute Entrance
customblocker.description: The entrance to one of Lord Dredmor's nefarious evisceration chutes. This one is firmly padlocked shut, but you can see traces of dried sap about the edges.

customblocker.name: Poster
customblocker.description: Oh give me a home, where the Carrottys roam, and the Potatoes and Mushys play, where seldom is heard a discouraging word, and the ceiling is not damp all day...

customblocker.name: Stocktaking Records
customblocker.description: Seems like this Farmer Bob has been running a booming vegetable wholesaling business.

customblocker.name: Signpost
customblocker.description: Farmer Bob's Happy Pastures - place your order for fresh vegetables today!

customblocker.name: Chalked Scribble
customblocker.description: No wand? No wand? Bah, that's not a life worth living!

customblocker.description: A dragon's nest. Seems like this nest's feathered with bits of old tomes.

customblocker.name: Dragon Nest
customblocker.description: A dragon's nest. It smells like warm rock. This nest is lined with bits of old plaster from the nearby walls.

customblocker.description: This corpse glints with fragments of crystallised radiance.

customblocker.name: Empty Shelves
customblocker.description: The shelves here have been emptied of their former contents and used as a nesting site.

customblocker.name: Portrait of Double-Tap
customblocker.description: Although Double-Tap's true name has been lost in the mists of time, this hero of the Thrusties was renowned for his(?) vigour and endurance, and through rigorous training, gained the ability to tap his victims not just once, but twice in quick succession. This folk hero's most famous of quotes is still bandied about by Thrusties of today as a saying of great approval: 'I'd tap that.'

pedestal.name: The Peace Circle
pedestal.text: Welcome to the peace circle. This is a safe place; no one here will judge you. This circle we have made represents peace and symbolises our harmony and goodwill; break it not with greed.

action.text: Hey man, don't break the peace circle!

customblocker.name: Crystallised Corpse
customblocker.description: Got to be a horrible way to go.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: This mine has been certified DSHA compliant. Headgear protection required at all times.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: This site has worked '0' days without an accident.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Know safety - no pain, no safety - know pain.

customblocker.name: Huge Diamond
customblocker.description: A huge diamond, stuck in the wall and polished to gleaming by nature. Pushing on this won't cause a huge flood in the cavern, you can be assured.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Foreman's corner.

customblocker.name: Workbench
customblocker.description: It's full of jewellers' tools, but there's no such craft skill in this game.

customblocker.name: Barred Door
customblocker.description: Collect your prize here when you're done.

customblocker.name: Sign
customblocker.description: Round up, one and all! Shoot the diggles and win prizes!

action.text: Well done! Go and claim your prizes!
